item.title: Chloë Moretz's Hit-Girl stars in new 'Kick-Ass 2' trailer - watch
item.description: The sequel also stars Aaron Johnson and Jim Carrey and hits cinemas on July 19

item.title: Channing Tatum stars in first trailer for Roland Emmerich's 'White House Down' - watch
item.description: The action-thriller also stars Jamie Foxx as the President of the United States and opens on June 28

item.title: Justin Timberlake breaks US sales records with new album
item.description: However, 'The 20/20 Experience' fails to break 1m sales

item.title: 'Thor' star Tom Hiddleston to appear in 'The Muppets' sequel
item.description: 'The Muppets... Again!' stars Ricky Gervais, Tina Fey and Ty Burrell and is due out in March 2014

item.title: Vampire Weekend delay release of new album
item.description: 'Modern Vampires Of The City' will now be released one week later than planned

item.title: Plot details for two 'Independence Day' sequels revealed
item.description: Bill Pullman is on board for the sequels but Will Smith hasn't said yes yet

item.title: Haim, Father John Misty and Kendrick Lamar to appear on new Kid Cudi album
item.description: 'Indicud' also features A$AP Rocky and Michael Bolton

item.title: Suede, Cat Power and The Strypes to kick off new series of Later...
item.description: Line-up announced for episode 1 of series 42 of Jools Holland show

item.title: New teaser clip for Baz Luhrmann's 'The Great Gatsby' released - watch
item.description: Luhrmann's lavish movie stars Leonardo DiCaprio and has a soundtrack overseen by Jay-Z

item.title: Justin Bieber investigated by police for alleged battery
item.description: Bieber's neighbour has filed a report against the pop singer following an argument

item.title: Mutya Keisha Siobhan feature on Blood Orange remix of Phoenix's 'Entertainment' – listen
item.description: The reformed Sugababes provide backing vocals on Dev Hynes' reworking of the single

item.title: Regina Spektor, Willy Mason, Bonehead added to Secret Garden Party bill
item.description: They join Soulwax and Django Django on the Cambridgeshire festival line-up

item.title: Queens Of The Stone Age announce plans for 'extensive' world tour
item.description: The band make their live return this weekend at Lollapalooza Brazil

item.title: Lou Reed cancels US tour dates including Coachella Festival
item.description: Five appearances from the former Velvet Underground man have been pulled 'due to unavoidable complications'

item.title: Tom Morello speaks about 'challenge' of joining Bruce Springsteen's band
item.description: Rage Against The Machine guitarist temporarily replaced Steven Van Zandt in E Street Band

item.title: Yeah Yeah Yeahs unveil raunchy new video featuring model Lily Cole - watch
item.description: See the 'Sacrilege' clip here

item.title: Arctic Monkeys to headline new Moscow festival
item.description: Hurts, Foals and Jessie Ware will also play Gorky Park in the Russian capital

item.title: The Courteneers announce two huge outdoor homecoming shows - ticket details
item.description: Frontman Liam Fray tells NME their Castlefield Bowl double header will be on 'another level'

item.title: Blue singer Lee Ryan denies ruining Dave Grohl's night out in London
item.description: Popstar says Grohl thinks he is a 'really cool guy'

item.title: Jackson 5's songwriter and producer Deke Richards dies aged 68
item.description: Musician passes away after battling oesophageal cancer

item.title: Arctic Monkeys' Alex Turner to appear on new Queens Of The Stone Age album
item.description: More big name stars for '...Like Clockwork' revealed

item.title: Jay-Z to hire 'cigar-roller' on Legends Of The Summer tour
item.description: Rapper will enjoy luxurious backstage area for his tour with Justin Timberlake

item.title: Coldplay's Chris Martin puts tour guitar up for auction to aid victims of Hurricane Sandy
item.description: Singer continues his charity crusade

item.title: A$AP Rocky surprised at reaction to his anti-homophobia comments
item.description: Rapper also teams up with Skrillex in 'Wild For The Nght' video

item.title: Scene of Oasis' '(What's The Story) Morning Glory' to host special Record Store Day events
item.description: London's Berwick Street stores lines up gigs, DJs and screening of Record Store Day documentary next month
